thread.title: Lokesh Rahul Lone Shining Light For India As Six-Star Steve O'Keefe Destroys Hosts In Pune - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Lokesh Rahul Lone Shining Light For India As Six-Star Steve O'Keefe Destroys Hosts In Pune - Indiatimes.com

title: Lokesh Rahul Lone Shining Light For India As Six-Star Steve O'Keefe Destroys Hosts In Pune - Indiatimes.com
text:
Somak Adhikari February 24, 2017 
Lokesh Rahul fought alone in a solo act of defiance against Australia as the visitors demolished the Indian batting line-up in Pune. 
AFP 
Having been bowled out for 260 early on Day 2, the opening bowlers Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood struck early before Rahul repaired the innings. 
His innings of 64 saw good shots as the man signaled a return to form after a bad patch with the bat. 
AFP 
However, it was the relatively unknown Steve O'Keefe who dominated the show from then on. The man snared 6 wickets as India collapsed from 94/3 to 105 all out. 
It was a massive batting collapse and means that the Aussies lead by 155 runs. They will look to drive home the advantage and set Virat Kohli's boys a stiff target on a pitch that is certainly not proving to be batsman friendly. Don't Miss
